original: Freidenvall, Bertil Torvald Fredrik, fil. mag., e. adjunkt, Mönsterås, f. 14/10/10 i Hulterstad, Kalm. 1., av folkskoll. A. H. F. F. o. Wictoria Henriksson. — Studrex. v. Lunds priv. elem:sk. 28, fil. kand. 3i7, fil. mag. 39, deltent. f. fil. lic. 41. Resa t. Danm. 31. Medarb. i Barometern 36-37, i S. D. S. 3S, lokalred. i Mönsterås f. Os-karshamnstidn. 41-47, e. adj. i Mönsterås sed. 46. V. ordf. i Mönsterås manskör, sekr. i kyrkokör. 42-46, förest. f. föreläsn :fören., sekr. i konst-fören., rev. i Mönsterås förs:hem o. i andelstvättstugefören., led. av turist-nd, hemb:fören., kyrkobröd,, Mönsteråshög. repr. i studiförb., pressomb. 0. sekr. v. Mönsteråsutst. 46, led. av D. S. K. Skr.: kort. upps. i pressen. Hobbies: sång, fotboll. Dipl. av Mönsterås hantvifören. f. förtj ifull ins. v. Mönsteråsutst.
translated: Freidenvall, Bertil Torvald Fredrik, BA, former teacher, Mönsterås. Born on October 14th, 1910 in Hulterstad, Kalmar county, son of A.H.F.F. and Wictoria Henriksson. Education: Lund's private elementary school (graduated 1928), Bachelor of Arts degree (1937), Master of Arts degree (1939), passed licentiate exam in philosophy (1941). Traveled to Denmark in 1931. Work: Collaborator in Barometern newspaper (1936-1937), in S.D.S. newspaper (1938), local editor of Mönsterås for Oskarshamnstidn newspaper (1941-1947), former teacher in Mönsterås since 1946. Activities: Vice-chairman of Mönsterås men's choir, secretary of the church choir (1942-1946), director of the lecture association, secretary of the art society, reviewer at Mönsterås congregation home and in the cooperative laundry association, member of tourist committee, home society and church bread committee, representative in study association, press representative and secretary of Mönsterås exhibition (1946), member of D.S.K. [Dalkarlarna singing group]. Writings: short essays in the press. Hobbies: singing and football. Awarded a diploma from the Mönsterås handicraft association for meritorious service at the Mönsterås exhibition. Married in 19XX (partner's name not given).

jobTitle: Local editor of Mönsterås for Oskarshamnstidn newspaper
Reviewer at Mönsterås congregation home and in the cooperative laundry association
